feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.22-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use more consistent notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2031
  • Don't use ANSI colors in the output of ds --version by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2032
  • Add color to the version number and "Update Available" in the usage t… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2033
  • Add quotes and color to the branch names in the notice in `switch_bra… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2034
  • Add quotes around branch name in notice by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2035

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.21-3...v2025.07.22-1

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.22-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix command-line parsing by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2036
  • Remove the filebrowser healthcheck by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2037

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.22-1...v2025.07.22-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.23-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update references to branch master to main in the docs by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2039
  • Update references to branch master to main in .github folder by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2040

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.23-1...v2025.07.23-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.23-3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add colors to folders, files and variables in notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2041
  • Begin replacing hard-coded CYAN color in notices with pre-defined colors by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2042
  • Create pre-defined colors for notice, warn, etc by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2043
  • Replace the rest of the hard-coded CYAN colors with pre-defined varia… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2044
  • Adjust file, folder and "running command" colors in notices by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2045
  • Change the update notice to a warning by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2046
  • Replace remaining hard-coded color codes in main. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2047

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.23-2...v2025.07.23-3
